name: Trolley Wars
description:
This was made during my first year at University, the idea was to create a chaotic local multiplayer game in the vain of Overcooked and Lovers in a Dangerous Space Time.

The objective is to collect as much of the shopping as possible and score the most before time runs out.

The game is designed to be played with controllers.
Note: Due to how Unity handles controllers by default, make sure you plug in your controllers only after you start the game.

This was only a prototype, but is the sort of thing I would love to continue developing in the future
